javadoc: LocalManagedOutputBlockStream extends LocalOutputBlockStream for use when updating versioned buffer file. This implementation causes change map data to be updated. It is important that the free list is updated after streaming is complete.
name: LocalManagedOutputBlockStream
comment:
LocalManagedOutputBlockStream extends LocalOutputBlockStream
 for use when updating versioned buffer file.  This implementation causes change
 map data to be updated.  It is important that the free list is updated after 
 streaming is complete.
